test.query: SELECT id, title, url, score, descendants, quantized8BitL2Distance( (SELECT vector_quantized FROM default.hackernews_embeddings_annoy3 LIMIT 1 OFFSET 100), vector_quantized ) as distance FROM default.hackernews_embeddings_annoy3 ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT id, title, url, score, descendants, L2Distance( (SELECT vector FROM default.hackernews_embeddings_annoy3 LIMIT 1 OFFSET 100), vector ) as distance FROM default.hackernews_embeddings_annoy3 ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 10
